author: Sarasota Herald-Tribune, Anna Bryson (abryson@heraldtribune.com), USA TODAY Network
title: In age of coronavirus, could social media be kids' saving grace?
description: In times of loneliness and isolation, how are kids coping and maintaining relationships? The same way they did before: with social media.
content:
Three moms sat down with USA TODAY to talk about how they parent their children in a world of likes and comments.
USA TODAY
Schools are shut down, sports have come to a halt, and teenagers wont be attending their senior proms.
